A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Congrats Disney! You had to kill the past to make way for the future. You dishonor the former characters and leave the next generations characters (Poe\, finn\, RAY) no one to learn from. 

Had the movie been what was implied in the trailer\, then this would have been amazing. 

These movies aren't made for the old generation\, we are living in a post Guardians of the Galaxy world now. Everything's is humorous and never serious\, because serious scares off the Disney family target audience. 

Be prepared to be disappointed folks\, there's more to come. And "it" as it were\, is over.
